Hydras:

Hdyras followed Crytek, but he was ready for everything

-----Original Message----- 
From: Super Cyclonus
Sent: Friday, November 12, 2010 11:05 AM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: The wrath of the Hydra/The return of a decepticon

> <OLD>
>
> "What if I offer you one of my scientist?"hissed hydras "in exchange of 
> the
> base and one protophorm?"

"You would give me a scientist in exchange for a base and one
protoform?" Cryotek said as he stroked his chin, an amused look on his
face.

He nodded to himself as in one smooth motion he rose from his chair.
"Come." Cryotek said, "I would show you what you are bargaining for."
With a grand gesture Cryotek gestured at the door as it slid open.
Several drones which look something like blue versions of the old
Seekers, although sleeker to appearance, stood waiting, obviously an
escort to take Hydras and Cryotek where ever they were going.

"This time it is just you alone." Cryotek said. "The rest of your men
can wait in the lobby area until we are done."

(TAG)

Preston
